select * from netfu_popup where view = 'yes' AND end_day >= curdate() and code = #{code} order by end_day
select link, thumbnail from netfu_58558_26593 where board_code = 'netfu_90000_90001' order by no desc limit 4

select aa.* from ( SELECT 'head' type, a.ser no, '' uid, concat(a.company_initial, '사') bizName, b.recruit_item_contents bizTitle, b.men bizMen, b.place_work bizArea1Name , DATE_FORMAT(b.date_work, '%m/%d') wdate FROM recruit_company AS a, recruit_item AS b WHERE 1=1 and a.prs='P' AND b.prs='P' AND a.ser=b.target_ser and b.date_work BETWEEN DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL - 5 MONTH ) AND NOW()
UNION ALL
select 'recruit' type , nic.no, nic.uid, nic.biz_name bizName, nic.biz_title bizTitle, nic.biz_men bizMen , concat(getCodeName(nic.biz_area1),' ', ifnull(getCodeName(nic.biz_area2), '')) bizArea1Name , DATE_FORMAT(nic.wdate, '%m/%d') wdate from netfu_item_company nic where 1=1 and nic.biz_ing <> 'yes' and ((nic.biz_end_type ='input' and nic.biz_end_day >= CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()) or nic.biz_end_type ='get' or nic.biz_end_type ='often') and (nic.biz_jobfrom LIKE '%netfu_48782_57525%' OR nic.biz_jobfrom LIKE '%netfu_85884_14481%') and wdate BETWEEN DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL - 5 MONTH ) AND NOW()
UNION ALL
select 'free' type , nic.no, nic.uid, nic.biz_name bizName, nic.biz_title bizTitle, nic.biz_men bizMen , concat(getCodeName(nic.biz_area1),' ', ifnull(getCodeName(nic.biz_area2), '')) bizArea1Name , DATE_FORMAT(nic.wdate, '%m/%d') wdate from netfu_item_company nic where 1=1 and nic.biz_ing <> 'yes' and ((nic.biz_end_type ='input' and nic.biz_end_day >= CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()) or nic.biz_end_type ='get' or nic.biz_end_type ='often') and (nic.biz_jobfrom LIKE '%netfu_34537_33276%' OR nic.biz_jobfrom LIKE '%freelancer%') and wdate BETWEEN DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL - 5 MONTH ) AND NOW()
UNION ALL
select 'alba' type , nic.no, nic.uid, nic.biz_name bizName, nic.biz_title bizTitle, nic.biz_men bizMen , concat(getCodeName(nic.biz_area1),' ', ifnull(getCodeName(nic.biz_area2), '')) bizArea1Name , DATE_FORMAT(nic.wdate, '%m/%d') wdate from netfu_item_company nic where 1=1 and nic.biz_ing <> 'yes' and ((nic.biz_end_type ='input' and nic.biz_end_day >= CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()) or nic.biz_end_type ='get' or nic.biz_end_type ='often') and (nic.biz_jobfrom LIKE '%netfu_34537_33276%' OR nic.biz_jobfrom LIKE '%arbeit%') and wdate BETWEEN DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL - 5 MONTH ) AND NOW() ) aa order by rand() limit 6
